amendment.description: To require a report on the training provided to members of the Armed Forces to prepare for post-conflict operations.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3276 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3276 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Lieberman. (consideration: CR S6433-6435; text: CR S6434-6435) To require a report on the training provided to members of the Armed Forces to prepare for post-conflict operations.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3276 proposed by Senator Dole for Senator Lieberman.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3276 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
